Name: pulse
Default: Position error ignored below this value
Max torque when in position control
State observer gain for disturbance rejection
Max torque when in speed control
Torque setpoint for internal mode (% rated)

Name: RPM
Default: Max speed when in torque control
Digital inputs active level (bit0-5: 0=Active high, 1=Active low)
Digital outputs active level (bit0-3: 0=Active high, 1=Active low)
Number of automatic fault reset tries (0=manual)

Name: RPM
Default: Speed for searching encoder index pulse

Name: pulse
Default: Position value to set at home point
Current detection for mechanical stop homing

Name: s
Default: Maximum time allowed for homing sequence

Name: pulse
Default: Position to move to after successful homing

Name: RPM
Default: Speed for move after homing completion

Name: μs
Default: Distributed clocks SYNC0 event cycle time

Name: ms
Default: SM watchdog timeout for process data

Name: ms
Default: Delay before engaging brake after motor stop

Name: ms
Default: Delay after releasing brake before motion

Name: V
Default: DC bus voltage to activate regen chopper
Write 1 to restore all parameters to factory defaults

Name: Number of assigned RxPDOs
Description: How many RxPDO objects are active

Name: Number of assigned TxPDOs
Description: How many TxPDO objects are active

Name: Max position deviation
Description: Maximum allowed following error before fault

Name: Position arrival threshold
Description: Position considered reached within this window

Name: Position arrival time
Description: Time to remain in window before in-position (0=immediate)

Name: Axis resolution
Description: User units per shaft revolution (for gearing)

Name: Position deviation
Description: Current position tracking error - TxPDO possible

Name: Position command internal
Description: Internal trajectory generator position - TxPDO possible

Name: Position feedback (encoder)
Description: Raw encoder position feedback - alternative to 0x6064

Name: Torque filtering
Description: First-order low-pass filter for torque feedback/command

Name: Speed loop Kp (alternative)
Description: Speed loop proportional gain (same as P2-04)

Name: Speed loop Ki (alternative)
Description: Speed loop integral gain (same as P2-05)

Name: Speed filter time constant
Description: First-order low-pass filter for speed calculation

Name: Torque FF filter
Description: Filter time constant for torque feedforward path
